price: Nous t’avons certes donné "les sept versets que l’on répète" , ainsi que le Coran sublime.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ
footnotes: [508] Allusion aux 7 versets de la Sourate 1, dont c’est l’un des titres - Sourate que l’on récite à chaque cycle d’actes de la Ṣalāt.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
